body: This is a very interesting question and I don't know the answer to it. One of my students is currently working on a connection between Grasshopper <> WUFI and he needs a similar process. I think the right place for get an answer for this is unmethours.com. I posted the question there and we'll see if anyone can help us with this: [https://unmethours.com/question/13279/change-u-value-of-constructio...](https://unmethours.com/question/13279/change-u-value-of-construction-during-the-simulation-with-eplus/)
